Text: Your Visit Thanks for spending some time with us at our office On the high yield side I have never seen my boss so quiet and uncomfortable at a company meeting Rumor is he left early to sell the telecom stocks he held in his own account On the equity side our utility fund manager is still getting up to speed Enron was the last stock I recommended at Loomis Sayles in and I have consistantly advocated a major overweight here at Eaton but she has been slow to buy and quick to sell I understand she is buying again In any event there is no doubt you made a deep impression on all of the Eaton participants Best regards Dave
